achievements.name: Spot Award
achievements.desc: I was recognized and awarded for the dedicated efforts towards researching and understanding the architecture of ShoreTel’s solution and Public Cloud which contributed greatly to the success of “AWS PoCs” built in the team.

achievements.name: Above and Beyond
achievements.desc: Our team of five people was recognized and awarded the best team of the quarter by the CEO of ShoreTel amidst all the employees for continued efforts on delivering amazing work on Public Cloud.
